title: NEED HALPP WITH HOTKEYS
body:
If you have indicator for an ability; holding down q and seeing the range/size of the ability on, then you can normally right click to cancel the ability from being used, that doesn't work for me anymore. I don't know what i did to change this but ever since a few days ago it stopped working. Also, normally whenever you hold down alt and left click on an ability in your hud, it will show the cool down of it, that stopped working for me too on the same day. ALSO, whenever i hold down either control or alt and right click it doesn't move my character anymore... 

If anyone knows how to fix i would be much appreciated. 
Note: I've reset my binds and before setting them back to my custom binds, tried to do these things and they still wouldn't work. I've initiated full repair to game and no luck. I've also tried if it worked on two different computers, it doesn't work on my account but others it does...

replies.body:
There might be a corruption with your settings causing it to not sync or work properly.  Resetting to default in game might not help, but a complete config reset could:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

Let me know if that helps.
I did it and it let me right click to cancel the indicator (Thank you :)..) but i still can't ping cool downs with using alt or control

There could also be third party software for your mouse+ keyboard that could be getting in the way, but I can't say for sure.  What happens if you try swapping them out with another?  If the issue persists, reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can look into this with you directly.

I've had this keyboard/mouse for over a year and this glitch has never occurred til just a few days ago.

also btw.. i have NO clue what happened. I didn't change any settings but now right clicking doesn't stop the indicator.. WTF. it fixed for 3 games and now it's not working...
also it doesn't work on multiple computers but just with my account so it's not the hardware/peripherals. I tried my brothers and a few more.
Will this do anything to my video settings and stuff?
You may need to readjust some of your settings so it can save and sync correctly to our server.
Try to reset your controls, maybe it works afterthat?
